item.title: April 25, 2024 Project Updates
item.content:encoded:
April​

  • Boards: Delivered to vendors
    • Vendors are QCing their units.
  • PCBs and Other Components: On the way
    • PCBs and accessories are en route and should be delivered to vendors within 4 weeks. Delivery ETAs will depend on the shipping method (air or freight) selected by regional vendors.

item.title: March 26, 2024 Project Updates
item.content:encoded:
March​

  • Boards and Other Components: On the way
    • Vendors are QCing their units. The remaining components have been shipped to the PCB factory to be combined with the PCB orders.
  • PCB Status: Pending Shipment
    • PCB production, flashing, and QC’ing has finished. The PCBs will ship to vendors with the remaining components when they arrive at the PCB factory next week.

item.title: February 28, 2024 Project Updates
item.content:encoded:
February​

  • Boards and Other Components: On the way
    • Vendors have begun to QC their units. KFA plans to ship out the remaining components to the factory to be combined with the PCB orders by next Monday.
  • PCB Status: In Progress
    • PCBs are in production. The factory has given us confirmation that production should be complete by the end of next week. Once they receive the accessory shipment, PCBs + accessories will be dispatched to each of the vendors.

item.title: January 23, 2024 Project Updates
item.content:encoded:
January​

  • Boards and Other Components: On the way
    • Some vendors have already received the boards. Vendors are waiting on PCBs and the remaining components from KFA before shipping to customers. KFA is slated to receive their batch of Januarys this week.
  • PCB Status: In Progress
    • PCBs are in production. Due to other projects being in the queue ahead of the January PCBs, they are expected to finish after the Chinese New Year.

item.title: December 29, 2023 Project Updates
item.content:encoded:
January​

  • Boards and Other Components: Pending Shipment
    • Some vendors have already received the boards. Vendors are waiting on PCBs and the remaining components from KFA before shipping to customers.
  • PCB Status: In Progress
    • Prototypes have been verified by two separate parties and we have greenlit production. An ETA for PCB production will be provided shortly.

The January 2024 update can be expected sooner rather than later. Thank you for your patience and we hope you all have a great New Year’s.

item.title: November 13, 2023 Project Updates
item.content:encoded:
January​

  • Boards and Other Components: Pending Shipment
    • All boards, carrying cases, and cloths have been packaged. The factory and vendors are finalizing the shipping logistics.
  • PCB Status: In Progress
    • The solder PCB prototype has been verified. We are waiting on the hotswap PCB prototype before giving the green light for manufacturing.

item.title: October 15, 2023 Project Updates
item.content:encoded:
Paragon​

  • Alexotos will be building a Paragon on Friday 10/20 at 7 pm EST. Tune in here!
  • Extras will go live on Vala Supply on Friday 10/20.
  • Extras are live on Deskhero.

January​

  • Manufacturing Status: Pending Shipment
    • All boards are finished. We are in the process of arranging shipping between the factory and vendors.
  • PCB Status: In Progress
    • The prototypes were not shipped to us due to a holiday but they are now en route.
  • Other Components: Pending Shipment
    • Carrying cases and cloths are finished. They will be shipped to vendors with the keyboards.

item.title: September 12, 2023 Project Updates
item.content:encoded:
January​

  • Manufacturing Status: In Progress
    • Polycarbonate cases and weights are expected to be completed within the next month.
  • PCB Status: In Progress
    • PCBs have been re-designed to comply with requirements. The new prototypes are expected to ship this week.
  • Other Components: In Progress
    • Carbon Fiber, Fr4, and Polycarbonate Plates have been delivered to KFA.
    • Feet and O-rings have been delivered to KFA.
    • Carrying cases and cloths are expected to be completed within the next month.

item.title: August 2, 2023 Project Updates
item.content:encoded:
Paragon​

  • Plate files are live here

January​

  • Packaging
    • Carrying Case and Cloth Sample have arrived
    • Foam insert has been re-designed and ordered for a better fit

item.title: July 23, 2023 Project Updates
item.content:encoded:
Paragon​

  • Manufacturing Status: Complete
  • Vala Supply and Deskhero are wrapping up fulfillment (extras TBA)
  • Boards are still in transit to DailyClack
  • Extras at CandyKeys and iLumkb are live

January​

  • Manufacturing Status: In Progress
    • Polycarbonate cases are almost finished.
    • Aluminum cases have been sandblasted and anodized.
    • Weights (case/wrist rest) are currently being sandblasted.
    • Carrying case and microfiber cloth samples are in production. They should be sent to us for review by the end of the month.
  • PCB Status: In Progress
    • Prototypes are en route to us.
